scripts.clean:mobile:android: find ./apps/mobile/android -name 'build' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true && find ./apps/mobile/android -name '.kotlin' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true && find ./apps/mobile/android -name '.gradle' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true && find ./apps/mobile/android -name '.cxx' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true && rm -rf ./apps/mobile/build
scripts.clean:packages: pnpm run clean:package:location && pnpm run clean:package:arcgis
scripts.packages:prepare: pnpm run package:location:prepare && pnpm run package:arcgis:prepare
scripts.packages:codegen: pnpm run package:location:codegen && pnpm run package:arcgis:codegen
